posts._title: Josué Ramos – Bajo la Rosa AKA Under the Rose (2017)
posts.title: Bajo la Rosa
posts.excerpt: Sara, the daughter of Oliver and Julia suddenly disappears. Days pass by without any news about the girl. But one morning, the family receives a letter from someone who claims to have retained Sara and wants to talk with them that night.

posts.title: Afterlov
posts.excerpt: It’s summertime in Athens and Nikos, a 30-year-old broke musician, is taking care of a luxurious villa in the suburbs that belongs to a friend of his. Between poolside cocktails and fooling around with the dog that he is meant to take care of, Nikos has a plan. Still unable to get over his recent …

posts._title: Akio Jissôji – Utamaro: Yume to shiriseba AKA Utamaro’s world (1977)
posts.title: Utamaro: Yume to shiriseba
posts.excerpt: ClarkeFountain-AllMovieGuide wrote:Utamaro was an artist who lived in Edo (which was later to become modern-day Tokyo) in the late 18th century. This film, which has a complex and wide-ranging storyline, recreates the world of that time, as it appeared in Utamaro’s paintings. In one the many scenes captured by the story, Utamaro watches the goings-on …

posts.title: FBI Code 98
posts.excerpt: Robert Cannon (Jack Kelly), Fred Vitale (Ray Danton) and Alan Nichols (Andrew Duggan), three men vital to America’s missile program, are en route to Cape Canaveral when a bomb is discovered in a suitcase. Defused by Vitale, the device is turned over to the FBI, which takes charge of the investigation. Assigned to determine if …

posts.title: The Camp on Blood Island
posts.excerpt: Plot Synopsis:An intensely stoic Andre Morell leads a group of POWs, interned under the sadistic rule of Commander Yamamitsu, who has vowed to massacre them all and raze the camp to the ground should Japan surrender to the Allies. posts.title: Le cerveau
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Not long after pulling off a spectacular train robbery in Great Britain, the criminal genius The Brain is soon planning his next lucrative enterprise. posts.title: Le grand restaurant
posts.excerpt: M. Septime rules the renowned Paris restaurant “Chez Septime” with an iron fist. Grovelling before his rich and powerful customers, M. posts._title: Krzysztof Kieslowski – La double vie de Véronique AKA The Double Life of Veronique (1991)
posts.title: La double vie de Véronique
posts.excerpt: Synopsis: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don’t know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.
